subject: Re: [junit] Class loader error with junit
msgSnippet: ... Not if you don t use the JUnit Swing UI :-) I don t use the UI at all and consequently have never needed to change the excluded.properties file,  but
messageBody:
At 10:30 PM 11/07/2001, Charlie Woloszynski wrote:
>Thanks for the tip. Very useful.
>
>Charlie
>
>I think I still need to change the excluded.properties to include
>org.apache.log4j, no?

Not if you don't use the JUnit Swing UI :-)
I don't use the UI at all and consequently have never needed to change the
excluded.properties file, but that's just me!

Robert

PS Thanks to Scott Stirling for a great explanation of the problem!
